description: This source file defines the BridgeRefreshCompletedEvent class, which extends ClusterCommandEvent, representing a specific event related to a Zigbee bridge refresh completion within a mock Zigbee core testing framework.

classes.name: BridgeRefreshCompletedEvent
classes.description: Represents a Zigbee bridge refresh completed event in the mock Zigbee framework, extending ClusterCommandEvent, containing specific identifiers and command payload.

methods.name: getCommandPayload
methods.description: Returns the payload bytes for the command, which is an empty byte array in this implementation.

methods.name: <constructor>
methods.description: Constructs a BridgeRefreshCompletedEvent with the given MockBridgeCluster, initializing command parameters.
